summary: In 16th century Japan, two samurai engage in massive battles across the countryside; one attempting to conquer and the other attempting to defend his land while repressing his love for a woman after taking a vow of celibacy.
cast: Takaaki Enoki|Masahiko Tsugawa|Atsuko Asano|Naomi Zaizen|Hironobu Nomura|John G. Andrews|Masatô Ibu|Morio Kazama|Kyôko Kishida|Hideo Murota|Isao Natsuyagi|Karen Newman|Hiroyuki Okita|Tsunehiko Watase|Stuart Whitman|Takeshi Ôbayashi|Hideji Ôtaki
title: Kagetora, el guerrero
